meanings.sent1: Those shitheads always cause trouble in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand dealing with those rude shitheads at work.
meanings.sent3: The party was ruined by a group of loud shitheads who wouldn't leave.
meanings.sent4: The politician was exposed as a corrupt shithead by the media.
meanings.sent5: The movie villain was portrayed as a cunning shithead who deceived everyone.

meanings.sent1: Don't listen to those shitheads spreading rumors about you.
meanings.sent2: He always acts like a clueless shithead when it comes to technology.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the silly shitheads who believe everything they hear.
meanings.sent4: Her ex-boyfriend was a complete shithead, always making foolish decisions.
meanings.sent5: The character in the story was written as a lovable shithead who made everyone laugh.
